usa: Ten more states secede from the Union and established the Confederate States of America.
Jefferson Davis is elected President of the Confederacy.
American Civil War: The war begins at Fort Sumter.
First Battle of Bull Run: The battle takes place.
australia: The ill-fated Burke and Wills expedition occurred.
Skiing in Australia introduced by Norwegians in the Snowy Mountains goldrush town of Kiandra.
argentina: Mendoza earthquake kills 8,000 to 10,000 citizens of Mendoza
albania: The first school known to use the Albanian language in modern times opened in Shkodër.
